title: Shriram Capital appoints Subhasri as MD and CEO
description: Shriram Capital has appointed Subhasri as its new managing director and CEO. Previously serving as joint managing director, she will now lead the company from September 1. Subhasri, who joined Shriram Group in 1991, has played a key role in its growth and expansion, demonstrating dedication and cross-functional expertise, according to DV Ravi, executive vice chairman of Shriram Capital.
